# robots.txt automaticaly generated by PrestaShop e-commerce open-source solution s
# http://www.prestashop.com - http://www.prestashop.com/forums
# This file is to prevent the crawling and indexing of certain parts

# and Google. By telling these "robots" where not to go on your site,
# you save bandwidth and server resources.

# Allow Directives
Allow: */modules/*.css
Allow: */modules/*.js
Allow: */modules/roythemescustomizer/*.png
Allow: */modules/roythemescustomizer/*.jpg
Allow: */modules/revsliderprestashop/*.png
Allow: */modules/revsliderprestashop/*.jpg

Allow: */modules/roythemescustomizer/*.jpg
# Private pages

Disallow: /*?orderway=

Disallow: /*controller=discount
Disallow: /*controller=footer

Disallow: /*controller=identity
Disallow: /*controller=images.inc
Disallow: /*controller=init
Disallow: /*controller=my-account
Disallow: /*controller=order

Disallow: /*controller=order-slip

Disallow: /*controller=order-follow
Disallow: /*controller=order-return
